Title: Requires entities receiving a certain tax exemption to employ New York state residents during the course of a project
Summary: Requires entities receiving a certain tax exemption to utilize New York State residents as at least eighty-five percent of its workforce during the course of a project for which the exemption is claimed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the employment of New York state residents by entities receiving certain tax breaks
